Actions.Name: Pheremone Blast
Actions.Description: A foe in range is pacified, then shoved either 1 space towards or away from the [name].

Actions.Name: Spur
Actions.Description: The character the [name] is latched on to dashes 3 and may deal 2 damage to an adjacent character of the [name]'s choice.

Actions.Name: Berserk
Actions.Description: The [name]'s host becomes sturdy, gains 5 vigor, and gains +1 action. These effects last until the end of the host's next turn.
